name: Poing (itch)
description:
Poing is a 2-player same-screen-multiplayer game, about a happy fox jumping on trampolines. It is vaguely inspired by Pong.

Poing is an entry in the Furry Game Jam, in March 2015. It was developed by Nathan "Narkiel" Chamot and reddit user "IntroIntroduction." If you encounter any problems, please contact Nathan at @ gmail.com

Minimum Requirements: Windows Vista or greater, 6mb hard disk space, and a screen resolution of 1024x768 or greater.
